description: Yakushimaru Hokuto is an old friend of Tamura`s from the days when the organization Tamura works for was illegitimate/Yakuza. Also being Mikuro`s older step-brother, Hokuto makes it possible for Tamura to get in touch with Mikuro in order to help Tamura figure out what is wrong with Haruhiko and how to deal with Rin.
name: Yakushimaru Hokuto
